cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.deeco

Class DEECoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.deeco.DEECoManager

  • public class DEECoManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Management class used to work with DEECo runtime (init/start/stop). It creates UDP broadcast-enabled JDEECo runtime

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2015 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz

    • Method Detail

      • areComponentsStillAlive

        public static boolean areComponentsStillAlive(long... componentLastPings)
        Static method which checks last pings provided in parameters for their age and determines if all of them are still alive (not older than a threshold)
        Parameters:
        componentLastPings - last ping timestamps
        Returns:
        true if none of the timestamp is older than threshold

        Initialize JDEECo runtime

        Parameters:
